summary: An email from an individual offering to participate in the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death, sent on August 11, 2019, shortly after Epstein died in custody.

persons.name: Unknown
persons.context: The individual sending the email volunteers to be part of a team investigating Jeffrey Epstein's death, indicating they have no travel plans and are available.

events.title: Investigation into Epstein's death
events.description: Reference to an investigation being formed or assigned to look into the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died in his jail cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 11, 2019, which was the day after Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his jail cell.
The sender volunteers to be part of an investigative team looking into Epstein's death.
The email suggests that a 'different team' might be assigned to investigate the death, indicating potential internal discussions or reassignments within a law enforcement or investigative agency.
